long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows one to filter the repetitive video recommendations that are constantly flooding the front page of youtube. 
Enter a keyword into the input text box, click add and then update and all videos with that word in the title will be removed from the page. As you scroll through the page the videos will be continuously filtered. 
You can remove words from the filter list by clicking the "X" next to them.
